People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 习近平和彭丽媛为出席第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛的国际贵宾举行欢迎宴会http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_1-01.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the evening of October 17, President Xi Jinping and Madame Peng Liyuan held a banquet at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing to welcome international dignitaries who came to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. This is Xi Jinping's speech, expressing a warm welcome to all guests attending the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum on behalf of the Chinese government and the Chinese people.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Ju Peng

;
; ;;;;; ; ;;;
;;
;

;On the evening of October 17, President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan held a banquet at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing to welcome international dignitaries who came to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. This is Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan taking a group photo with international dignitaries.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Xueren

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17th   (Reporters Yang Yijun and Kong Xiangxin) On the evening of October 17, President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan held a banquet at the Great Hall of the People to welcome international dignitaries who came to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. Li Qiang, Zhao Leji, Wang Huning, Cai Qi, Ding Xuexiang, Li Xi and Han Zheng attended.

;

;In autumn in Beijing, the setting sun enters the picture, the lights of Tiananmen Square bloom, and the Great Hall of the People is solemn and brilliant.

;

;International dignitaries including foreign heads of state, heads of government, heads of international organizations and their spouses attending the summit forum arrived at the Great Hall of the People one after another. Soldiers of honor lined up to pay tribute. More than 150 national flags and United Nations flags of countries co-constructing the "Belt and Road" were neatly arranged on both sides of the red carpet, which was magnificent.

;

;Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan warmly welcomed foreign leaders and their wives, shook hands with them one by one, and took group photos with them.

;

;In the welcome song, Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan walked into the golden hall together with the distinguished guests.

;

;Xi Jinping delivered a speech, expressing a warm welcome to all guests attending the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum on behalf of the Chinese government and the Chinese people.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out, “Spring brings forth flowers, and autumn brings harvest.” In the 10 years since the Belt and Road Initiative was proposed, China has worked with partners from all sides to promote peace, cooperation, openness, inclusiveness, and mutual learning. , the Silk Road spirit of mutual benefit and win-win, jointly contribute to global connectivity, build a platform for international economic cooperation, and add impetus to world economic growth. We have carried out thousands of pragmatic cooperation projects, harvested solid and substantial results, and jointly painted a magnificent picture of connecting the world and sharing beauty and prosperity. These achievements are made by governments, enterprises and people of various countries with hard work, wisdom and courage! Let us pay tribute to all participants and builders of the Belt and Road Initiative!

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" pursues development, advocates win-win results, and delivers hope. Only through continuous self-improvement and unremitting struggle can we reap abundant fruits and establish long-term achievements that will benefit the future and benefit all people. This is the responsibility of our generation of politicians to current and future generations. The joint construction of the "Belt and Road" has gone through its first prosperous decade, and it is now in its prime. We must forge ahead with high spirits and head towards the next golden decade!

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that the world today is not peaceful, the downward pressure on the world economy is increasing, and global development is facing many challenges, but we firmly believe that the historical trend of peace, development, cooperation, and win-win is unstoppable, and the people's pursuit of a better future The yearning for life is unstoppable, and the desire of all countries to achieve common development and prosperity is unstoppable. As long as we stick to our original intention of cooperation and keep our development mission in mind, the high-quality Belt and Road Initiative will surely shine with the glory of the times and create a better future for mankind through our joint efforts! (See the second page for the full text of the speech)

;

;After the banquet, Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan watched the theatrical performance "Along the Silk Road" with the distinguished guests, and experienced the exchanges and mutual learning of the colorful civilizations and splendid cultures of the countries along the "Belt and Road". Beauty is shared.

;

;Wang Yi, Yin Li, Li Shulei, He Lifeng, Wang Xiaohong and others attended the above activities.

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平同智利总统博里奇会谈http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_2-01.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 17, President Xi Jinping He held talks at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing with Chilean President Boric, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay a state visit. Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcome ceremony for Boric in the North Hall of the Great Hall of the People.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Yue Yuewei

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17th   (Reporters Sun Yi, Ji Ning) On the morning of October 17, President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People with President Boric of Chile, who was in China to attend the 3rd "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay a state visit. .

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Chile is the first South American country to establish diplomatic relations with the People’s Republic of China and is also a pioneer in the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” between China and Latin America. Since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Chile more than half a century ago, relations between the two countries have always maintained stable and healthy development. Cooperation in various fields has promoted the development and revitalization of their respective countries and brought tangible benefits to the people of the two countries. China and Chile have become good friends with mutual trust and good partners seeking common development. Under the current circumstances, China is willing to work with Chile to continue the traditional friendship between the two countries and continuously enrich the contemporary connotation of the China-Chile comprehensive strategic partnership.

;

;Xi Jinping profoundly expounded the essential connotation of Chinese-style modernization. Xi Jinping emphasized that China and Chile share the same ideals and always adhere to mutual respect, mutual benefit and win-win results. Both sides should continue to firmly support each other in taking development paths that are in line with their own national conditions, and firmly support each other's core interests and major concerns. Taking the signing of the "Belt and Road" cooperation plan as an opportunity to strengthen the docking of development strategies, jointly build the "Belt and Road" with high quality, deepen traditional cooperation in economy, trade, infrastructure and other fields, and cultivate new growth poles for cooperation in clean energy, digital economy, technological innovation and other fields, Make Chile the bridgehead for China and Latin America to jointly build the "Belt and Road" with high quality. China is willing to strengthen exchanges of experience in state governance and administration with Chile, share successful practices in poverty eradication, green transformation, and environmental protection, welcome more Chilean high-quality agricultural products and specialty commodities to enter the Chinese market, and encourage Chinese enterprises to participate in major Chilean project construction cooperation. China is willing to Strengthen Chinese teaching and local cooperation with Chile, facilitate personnel exchanges, and consolidate the public opinion foundation of China-Chile relations. Strengthen people-to-people and cultural exchanges, promote mutual learning among civilizations, and set an example in implementing global civilization initiatives. China and Chile are both countries in the Global South. China is willing to strengthen communication and cooperation with Chile within the United Nations, Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation and other frameworks, maintain unity and cooperation among developing countries, and safeguard true multilateralism and free trade. China attaches great importance to the development of China-Latin America relations, appreciates Chile's positive contributions to promoting the development of China-Latin America relations and the construction of the China-CELAC Forum, and hopes that Chile will continue to play a unique role in promoting China-Latin America cooperation.

;

;Boric said that it is a great honor for me to come to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay a state visit. Chile has created many firsts in the development of Latin America-China relations, and Chile is deeply proud of it. Chile highly appreciates Chinese civilization, admires and congratulates China on its great achievements in poverty reduction and anti-corruption, and thanks China for its selfless help when Chile faces difficulties such as the COVID-19 epidemic. Chile has always firmly adhered to the one-China principle and will continue to provide China with firm support on various occasions. The "Belt and Road" initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping is derived from China's traditional culture of more than 5,000 years and is based on the principles of equality and mutual respect. It has become an important platform for countries around the world to carry out mutually beneficial cooperation and an important opportunity to achieve common development. Chile speaks highly of and will continue to actively participate. Chile thinks and plans the development of relations with China from a long-term perspective. It hopes to take this visit as an opportunity to strengthen cooperation in environmental protection, poverty alleviation, energy, science and technology, mining and other fields, and deepen people-to-people and cultural exchanges. It welcomes Chinese companies to invest in Chile and promote Chile. China-China relations will carry forward the past and open up the future, entering a new stage of development at a higher level. Chile supports China's joining the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership and the Digital Economy Partnership Agreement, speaks highly of China's peaceful foreign policy, and is willing to communicate and collaborate closely with China within multilateral frameworks such as APEC to promote the global South The country strengthens unity and cooperation to build a community with a shared future for mankind. Chile hopes to become a hub for cooperation between China and Latin American countries and play a positive role in promoting the development of Latin American and Chinese relations.

;

;After the talks, the two heads of state jointly witnessed the signing of multiple agreements in the fields of jointly building the "Belt and Road", development cooperation, industrial investment, digital economy, technological innovation, customs inspection and quarantine, agriculture, Antarctica, and small and medium-sized enterprise cooperation. Bilateral cooperation documents.

;

;The two sides issued the "Joint Statement of the People's Republic of China and the Republic of Chile."

;

;Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcome ceremony for Boric in the North Hall of the Great Hall of the People, accompanied Boric to review the honor guard of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, and watched the procession.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;;

;;https:// feedx.best;

; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平同印度尼西亚总统佐科会谈http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_3-01.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;The afternoon of October 17 , President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing with Indonesian President Joko Widodo, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay a state visit. Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcome ceremony for Jokowi in the North Hall of the Great Hall of the People.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Liu Bin

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17th  ; (Reporters Yang Yijun and Zhang Xiao) On the afternoon of October 17, President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People with Indonesian President Joko Widodo, who was in China to attend the 3rd "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay a state visit.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Indonesia is the first place where I proposed to jointly build the "21st Century Maritime Silk Road". In the past 10 years, China and Indonesia have adhered to extensive consultation, joint contribution and shared benefits, complemented each other's advantages, and jointly promoted development, which has brought great benefits to the people of the two countries and has become an important example of international cooperation in jointly building the "Belt and Road". China is willing to continue to support each other on the road to modernization and national rejuvenation with Indonesia, lead the long-term and stable development of bilateral relations by jointly building a China-Indonesia community with a shared future, provide greater assistance to each other's development and revitalization, and inject inexhaustible impetus into international and regional peace and prosperity. .

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China is willing to work with Indonesia to continue to view and develop relations between the two countries from a strategic and long-term perspective, make good use of existing mechanisms to deepen all-round strategic cooperation, and strengthen cooperation on issues involving each other's core interests and major concerns. We should support each other and work together to pursue modernization paths that suit our respective national conditions. The Jakarta-Bandung high-speed railway is the "golden sign" of China-Indonesia cooperation in building the "Belt and Road". China is willing to sum up successful experiences with Indonesia, conduct follow-up high-quality operations, and cultivate the Jakarta-Bandung high-speed railway economic belt. Both sides should deepen the integration of industrial and supply chains and work together to promote the construction of "regional comprehensive economic corridors" and "two countries, two parks". China supports relevant localities and enterprises to participate in the development and construction of major projects such as Indonesia's new capital and North Kalimantan Industrial Park. China is willing to continue to increase imports of high-quality agricultural and fishery products from Indonesia and expand and strengthen cooperation in emerging industries such as digital economy, photovoltaics, and new energy vehicles. Actively carry out exchanges and cooperation in the fields of food and agricultural technology, poverty alleviation, medicine and health, education, culture, tourism, and youth. The two sides should collaborate closely to maintain ASEAN's central status, promote open regionalism, demonstrate the responsibility of major developing countries, work together to promote the reform of the global governance system, and safeguard international fairness and justice.

;

;Jokowi said that since his meeting with President Xi Jinping in Chengdu more than two months ago, cooperation between the two countries has made positive progress. The Jakarta-Bandung high-speed railway has been completed as scheduled this month and will be officially opened for operation. I fully agree with President Xi Jinping’s views on developing relations between the two countries. Indonesia regards China as an important strategic partner in national economic development and construction, and looks forward to further strengthening communication and cooperation with China, enhancing mutual trust, and developing closer relations, which will not only benefit the two peoples, but also contribute to promoting regional peace and prosperity. Indonesia is willing to work with China to jointly build the "Belt and Road" with high quality, welcomes more Chinese companies to participate in the construction of Indonesia's new capital and the North Kalimantan Industrial Park, and accelerates the promotion of major projects such as the "Regional Comprehensive Economic Corridor" and the "Twin Parks in Two Countries". It is hoped to further expand exports of agricultural products to China and strengthen cooperation in electric vehicles, finance, energy security and other fields. Indonesia appreciates the series of important initiatives proposed by President Xi Jinping and is willing to better align ASEAN's Indo-Pacific outlook with the "Belt and Road" initiative to help achieve regional common development and the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development.

;

;After the talks, the two heads of state jointly inaugurated the official opening of the Jakarta-Bandung high-speed railway, and witnessed the signing of agreements on establishing a coordination mechanism for jointly building the "Belt and Road" cooperation, implementing global development initiatives, rural development and poverty reduction, A number of bilateral cooperation documents in the fields of sustainable development, inspection and quarantine.

;

;The two sides will issue the "Joint Statement of the People's Republic of China and the Republic of Indonesia on Deepening All-Round Strategic Cooperation."

;

;Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcome ceremony for Jokowi in the North Hall of the Great Hall of the People, accompanied Jokowi to review the honor guard of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, and watched the parade.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 在第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛欢迎宴会上的祝酒辞http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_1-02.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;

;Dear heads of state and government,

;

;Heads of international organizations,

;

;Representatives of various countries,

;

;Distinguished guests,

;

;Ladies, gentlemen, friends:

;

;Good evening!

;

;I am very happy to gather with all my friends. First of all, on behalf of the Chinese government and people, and together with my wife, I would like to extend a warm welcome to all the distinguished guests attending the 3rd "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum!

;

;“Spring brings forth flowers, and autumn harvests.” In the 10 years since the Belt and Road Initiative was proposed, China has worked with all partners to promote peace and cooperation, openness and inclusiveness, mutual learning, and mutual benefit. The winning Silk Road spirit will jointly contribute to global connectivity, build a platform for international economic cooperation, and add impetus to world economic growth.

;

;We have carried out thousands of pragmatic cooperation projects, harvested solid and substantial results, and jointly painted a magnificent picture of connecting the world and sharing beauty and prosperity. These achievements do not fall from the sky, nor are they given by gifts from others, but are made by governments, enterprises and people of various countries with hard work, wisdom and courage! Let us pay tribute to all participants and builders of the Belt and Road Initiative!

;

;The joint construction of the "Belt and Road" pursues development, advocates win-win results, and delivers hope. Throughout the history of human development, only through continuous self-improvement and unremitting struggle can we reap abundant fruits and establish long-term achievements that will benefit the future and benefit all people. This is the responsibility of our generation of politicians to current and future generations. The joint construction of the "Belt and Road" has gone through its first prosperous decade, and it is now in its prime. We must forge ahead with high spirits and head towards the next golden decade!

;

;Ladies, gentlemen, friends!

;

;Today’s world is not peaceful, the downward pressure on the world economy is increasing, and global development faces many challenges. However, we firmly believe that the historical trend of peace, development, cooperation, and win-win is unstoppable, and the people’s yearning for a better life The desire of all countries to achieve common development and prosperity is unstoppable. As long as we stick to our original intention of cooperation and keep our development mission in mind, the high-quality Belt and Road Initiative will surely shine with the glory of the times and create a better future for mankind through our joint efforts!

;

;Now, I propose that we all raise a toast together,

;

;To the complete success of the 3rd "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum,

;

;To all the distinguished guests and The health of your family,

;

;Cheers to all the participants and builders of the Belt and Road Initiative!

;

;Cheers!

;

;(Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17)

;;

; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 习近平会见哈萨克斯坦总统托卡耶夫http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_2-02.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 17, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with President Tokayev of Kazakhstan, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photographed by Xinhua News Agency reporter Yao Dawei

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17th   (Reporters Sun Yi, Chen Xu) On the morning of October 17, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with President Tokayev of Kazakhstan, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that a healthy, stable and dynamic Sino-Kazakhstan relationship is conducive to the development and revitalization of both countries, and is also conducive to regional peace and stability. China supports Kazakhstan in safeguarding independence, sovereignty and territorial integrity. No matter how the international situation changes, China and Kazakhstan must adhere to their original aspirations, help each other, pass on the concept of good neighborliness and friendship from generation to generation, and continuously promote the development of the permanent comprehensive strategic partnership between the two countries.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that 10 years ago, I first proposed the initiative of jointly building the "Silk Road Economic Belt" in Kazakhstan. The two sides should strengthen cooperation to promote the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" to achieve more results and better benefit the two peoples. China is willing to work with Kazakhstan to continuously improve the level of trade and investment facilitation and implement key production capacity investment cooperation projects. China is willing to expand imports of high-quality green agricultural products from Kazakhstan, expand green energy cooperation, strengthen interconnection, expand the scale of railway freight between the two countries, increase the use of trans-Caspian international transportation routes, and improve the capacity, scale and efficiency of China-Europe trains. The two sides should tap the potential, create new growth points for cooperation, strengthen the strategic alignment between the construction of the "Digital Silk Road" and the "Digital Kazakhstan", and promote exchanges in digital technologies such as cross-border e-commerce, artificial intelligence, big data, and blockchain. The China-Kazakhstan mutual visa exemption agreement is about to take effect, and the Kazakhstan Tourism Year will be held in China next year. The two sides should strengthen cultural exchanges and local cooperation, promote the construction of Luban Workshop, and solidify the foundation of social public opinion. China firmly opposes external forces interfering in the internal affairs of Central Asian countries, and is willing to continue to strengthen communication and coordination with Kazakhstan to promote China-Central Asia cooperation to become deeper and more solid. China supports Kazakhstan in its role as the rotating chairman of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization and promotes cooperation in the organization to a higher level. New level.

;

;Tokayev said that I am very happy to be invited to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. Kazakhstan is the first place where President Xi Jinping initiated the Belt and Road Initiative. From the first day, Kazakhstan has firmly supported and actively participated in it. Over the past 10 years, China has become a leading global power and has made brilliant achievements in jointly building the "Belt and Road". Kazakhstan wishes and believes that this summit forum will be a complete success! President Xi Jinping successfully paid a state visit to Kazakhstan in September last year, which injected strong impetus into the development of Kazakhstan-China permanent comprehensive strategic partnership. Relevant departments of both sides have conscientiously implemented the consensus reached by the two heads of state, and cooperation in relevant fields has made positive progress. China is Kazakhstan's forever trusted friend and partner. Kazakhstan is willing to work with China to continue to firmly support each other, deepen practical cooperation, intensify people-to-people and cultural exchanges, and jointly create a new golden 30 years for Kazakhstan-China relations. Kazakhstan speaks highly of China's fair stance and positive role in international affairs, including its efforts to promote the resolution of the Ukrainian crisis, and is willing to strengthen multilateral communication and coordination with China.

;

;The two heads of state jointly witnessed the signing of a number of bilateral cooperation documents in areas such as connectivity and economic development.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 习近平会见塞尔维亚总统武契奇http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_3-02.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the afternoon of October 17, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Yan Yan

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17th  ; (Reporters Yang Yijun, Chen Xu) On the afternoon of October 17, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with President Vucic of Serbia, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Serbia is a die-hard friend of China. The relationship between the two countries has withstood the test of the vicissitudes of the international situation and can be regarded as a model of friendly relations between China and European countries. The two countries have achieved fruitful results in cooperation in areas such as infrastructure construction and production capacity. The depth and breadth of practical cooperation have continued to expand, and the quality and efficiency have continued to improve. The important consensus we reached in February last year on opening direct flights between China and Serbia and negotiating and signing a bilateral free trade agreement has been implemented, which will surely inject new momentum into the development of China-Serbia relations in the new era.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that in the face of major changes in the world unseen in a century, both sides should view China-Serbia relations from a strategic and long-term perspective, firmly support each other's core interests and major concerns, and firmly support the development paths chosen by each. China firmly supports Serbia in safeguarding national sovereignty and territorial integrity, and is willing to continue to strengthen strategic alignment with Serbia and transform China-Serbia traditional friendship into more practical cooperation results. The two sides should jointly build and operate the Hungary-Serbia Railway, give full play to the economic and social benefits of HBIS Smedelevo Steel Plant and other projects, solidly promote cooperation in key areas such as infrastructure construction, and at the same time actively explore cooperation in digital economy, scientific and technological innovation, etc. New growth point. The two sides should comprehensively strengthen cooperation in the fields of culture, education, tourism, sports and other fields, so that the iron-clad friendship between China and Serbia will shine with new brilliance in the new era.

;

;Vucic said that I led a large government delegation to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum, which reflects Serbia's respect, friendship and attention to China. Serbia-China relations have withstood various tests. Serbia firmly pursues a friendly policy towards China, stands with China on all China-related issues, and firmly adheres to the one-China policy. We are proud of the iron-clad friendship between Serbia and China. China has always respected and treated Serbia as an equal, and provided timely and valuable support when Serbia faced difficulties. China's help and cooperation have enabled Serbia's economy to maintain sound development and brought great benefits to its people. I am very pleased that the two sides will sign a free trade agreement and other cooperation documents during this visit, which will open up new prospects for cooperation between the two countries. Serbia fully supports the global development initiative, global security initiative and global civilization initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping, and will continue to actively participate in the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" and deepen friendly cooperation in various fields. It is hoped that both sides will intensify people-to-people and cultural exchanges.

;

;After the meeting, the two heads of state jointly witnessed the signing of a number of bilateral cooperation documents such as the mid-term action plan for jointly building the "Belt and Road", a memorandum of understanding on industrial and investment cooperation, and a free trade agreement.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 习近平会见乌兹别克斯坦总统米尔济约耶夫http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_4-02.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the afternoon of October 17, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with President Mirziyoyev of Uzbekistan, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Liu Bin

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17th  ; (Reporters Yang Yijun, Ji Ning) On the afternoon of October 17, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with President Mirziyoyev of Uzbekistan, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that in May this year, we successfully met in Xi'an and the important consensus reached on the development of bilateral relations is being fully implemented. China is comprehensively promoting the construction of a strong country and national rejuvenation with Chinese-style modernization. Uzbekistan has launched the “Uzbekistan-2030” strategy. The two countries have similar development goals and consistent concepts. China is willing to take the 10th anniversary of the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" initiative as an opportunity to learn from, support and achieve each other's achievements with Uzbekistan in the process of national modernization, work together to build a China-Uzbekistan community with a shared future, and inject more into regional peace and prosperity. Certainty and positivity.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that both sides should continue to firmly support each other. China supports Uzbekistan in safeguarding its sovereignty, independence and territorial integrity, and firmly opposes any force interfering in Uzbekistan's internal affairs under any pretext. Both sides should implement the medium- and long-term cooperation plans for economic, trade and investment, promote cooperation in key areas, and create conditions for the early start of the China-Kyrgyzstan-Uzbekistan railway project. China supports expanding cooperation in new energy, innovation, local and other fields, and is willing to import more high-quality products from Uzbekistan. We welcome more Uzbek young people to study in China and are willing to provide more scholarships to Uzbekistan. The two sides should also speed up the construction of cultural centers and Luban workshops in each other, and strengthen exchanges and cooperation in poverty reduction experiences. China is willing to work with Uzbekistan to conscientiously implement the outcomes of the China-Central Asia Xi'an Summit and assist the development and revitalization of the six countries.

;

; Mirziyoyev said that under the wise leadership of President Xi Jinping, China has overcome various challenges and continuously achieved amazing and great achievements, which Uzbekistan admires very much. China is Uzbekistan's reliable cooperative partner, and Uzbekistan-China relations have set an example for good-neighborliness, friendship, mutual benefit and win-win results for all countries. The "Belt and Road" initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping is a great open and inclusive project, and Uzbekistan has always firmly supported and actively participated in it. Uzbekistan hopes to learn from China's experience in poverty reduction, deepen exchanges and cooperation in various fields such as economic and trade investment, connectivity, new energy, agriculture, and people-to-people and cultural exchanges within the framework of the "Belt and Road" initiative, and promote the construction of the "Green Silk Road". Uzbekistan firmly adheres to the one-China principle, fully supports the global development initiative, global security initiative, and global civilization initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping, and is willing to work with China to conscientiously implement the important consensus reached by the two heads of state, continuously open up a new chapter in bilateral relations, and promote the construction of a shared future. community. The China-Central Asia mechanism is an important platform for regional countries to strengthen unity and achieve development. Uzbekistan is willing to work with China to actively promote the continuous development and growth of the mechanism.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 习近平会见埃塞俄比亚总理阿比http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_5-02.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 17, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Prime Minister Abiy of Ethiopia, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay an official visit.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Ding Lin

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17th  ; (Reporters Sun Yi, Xia Ke) On the morning of October 17, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay an official visit.

;

;Xi Jinping congratulated Ethiopia on being invited to join the BRICS cooperation mechanism and pointed out that Ethiopia is an important participant in the joint construction of the "Belt and Road". In the past 10 years, China and Ethiopia have jointly built the "Belt and Road" with a wide range of cooperation areas and achievements. Zhifeng is at the forefront of China-Africa cooperation. The two sides should take the opportunity of establishing an all-weather strategic partnership to continuously consolidate friendship and mutual trust, deepen practical cooperation, promote bilateral relations to achieve more results, be friends of common development and win-win cooperation, and promote South-South solidarity and cooperation, and safeguard international fairness and justice. partner.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China supports Ethiopia in safeguarding sovereignty, security, and development interests. The two sides must continue to strengthen unity and cooperation and firmly support each other on issues involving each other's core interests and major concerns. China is willing to strengthen practical cooperation with Ethiopia in various fields within the framework of the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" and the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, support and participate in Ethiopia's post-war reconstruction and economic revitalization, strengthen green development cooperation, implement global development initiatives, and help Ethiopia achieve develop. Ethiopia is a marathon powerhouse in the world. China is willing to work with Ethiopia to carry forward the marathon spirit, join hands in promoting peace and development, and jointly build a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;Abiy said that during my trip, I found that Beijing is cleaner and more beautiful and the people are happier, which demonstrates the great efforts and great achievements made by the Chinese government in recent years. China is an important partner of Ethiopia. China's investment and cooperation, especially the cooperation in jointly building the "Belt and Road", have effectively promoted Ethiopia's economic and social development. The relationship between Ethiopia and China is on the right path. Further strengthening bilateral relations is not only vital to Ethiopia, but also of great significance to South-South unity. Ethiopia hopes to learn from China's experience in party and state governance, and looks forward to continuing to promote the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" with China, carrying out closer cooperation in key areas, and welcomes more Chinese companies to invest in Ethiopia. The global development initiative, global security initiative and global civilization initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping embody equality, openness and mutual respect and are conducive to promoting common development. Ethiopia highly appreciates and actively supports it and is willing to work closely with China to promote its implementation.

;

;The two sides issued the "Joint Statement between the People's Republic of China and the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia on the Establishment of an All-Weather Strategic Partnership."

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 习近平会见匈牙利总理欧尔班http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_6-02.htm
;Wednesday, October 18, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 17, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Rao Aimin

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 17th  ; (Reporters Sun Yi, Luo Xin) On the morning of October 17, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Hungary was one of the first countries to recognize and establish diplomatic relations with New China, and the traditional friendship between the two countries has a long history. In recent years, China-Hungary relations have always maintained high-level development. The political mutual trust between the two countries has been continuously deepened, mutually beneficial cooperation has been fruitful, people-to-people exchanges are rich and colorful, and the two sides have cooperated well in international and regional affairs, especially the joint fight against the COVID-19 epidemic, and the friendship between the two peoples has become even deeper. Hungary has long been firmly committed to a friendly policy towards China and actively supports the joint construction of the "Belt and Road". Prime Minister Orban has attended the "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum three times in a row, which I highly appreciate. China is willing to continue to be good friends and partners with mutual trust and win-win cooperation with Hungary. China will take the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations next year as an opportunity to continuously push the China-Hungary comprehensive strategic partnership to a new level and continue to write a new chapter in China-Hungary friendly cooperative relations. Chapter.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China is willing to strengthen exchanges of experience in party and state governance with Hungary, firmly support the development path chosen by each other, strengthen the in-depth integration of the "Belt and Road" initiative and Hungary's "Opening to the East" strategy, and share Development opportunities and outcomes. Both sides should strive for the completion and opening of the Hungary-Serbia railway as scheduled, successfully run the China-EU trade and logistics cooperation park, expand the scale of cross-border e-commerce, and expand cooperation in information technology and new energy industries. China is willing to expand imports of Hungarian high-quality agricultural products. The two sides should make good use of the mutually established cultural center platform, encourage language teaching in both countries, and pass on the traditional friendship between China and Hungary from generation to generation. Cooperation between China and Central and Eastern European countries is in line with the common interests of China and Central and Eastern European countries. China is willing to work with Hungary to continue to lead the cooperation between China and Central and Eastern European countries in the right direction, continuously enrich the connotation of cooperation between China and Central and Eastern European countries, and help China-EU relations achieve stability and long-term development.

;

;Orban said that with the personal care and support of President Xi Jinping, Hungary-China relations have maintained good development and achieved fruitful results in recent years. The investment and cooperation of Chinese enterprises, including the construction of the Hungary-Serbia railway, have significantly promoted Hungarian economic and social development.匈方深信，习近平主席提出的“一带一路”倡议将给世界带来重大改变，有利于促进世界经济发展，给各国人民带来更多福祉，匈方坚定支持并将继续积极参与。当前复杂形势下，匈牙利致力于深化匈中友好合作关系的决心坚定不移，将继续做中国在欧盟可以信任的朋友和伙伴。匈方反对任何脱钩断链和所谓“去风险”的做法，愿同中方一道加强经贸投资、互联互通等领域合作，深化人文交流。匈方将继续积极促进中东欧国家同中国合作，推动欧中关系健康稳定发展。

;

;蔡奇、王毅参加会见。

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 习近平会见巴布亚新几内亚总理马拉佩http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_7-02.htm
;2023年10月18日星期三
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;10月17日上午，国家主席习近平在北京人民大会堂会见来华出席第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛并进行正式访问的巴布亚新几内亚总理马拉佩。
;新华社记者姚大伟摄

;
; ;

;新华社北京10月17日电  （记者孙奕、林苗苗）10月17日上午，国家主席习近平在人民大会堂会见来华出席第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛并进行正式访问的巴布亚新几内亚总理马拉佩。

;

;习近平指出，巴新是最早同新中国建交的太平洋岛国之一。建交47年来，两国全面战略伙伴关系日益成熟稳健。中方赞赏巴新恪守一个中国原则，在涉及中国核心利益和重大关切问题上坚定支持中方。中方也将坚定支持巴新维护国家主权、安全、发展利益，走符合自身国情的发展道路，愿同巴新赓续传统友谊，夯实政治互信，拓展合作领域，造福两国人民。

;

;习近平强调，巴新是首个同中国签署共建“一带一路”谅解备忘录和合作规划的太平洋岛国，莫尔斯比港独立大道、布图卡学园等项目建设取得积极进展，为中国同太平洋岛国共建“一带一路”发挥了带头示范作用。中方愿同巴新继续高质量共建“一带一路”，分享中国式现代化带来的发展机遇，精准对接两国发展战略，加强基础设施、农林渔业、清洁能源、气候变化等领域合作，助力巴新实现工业化和现代化。

;

;习近平强调，中国始终坚持大小国家一律平等，主张和睦邻邦。中国对太平洋岛国的帮助是南南合作，坦坦荡荡、真诚无私。中方对太平洋岛国的帮助不附加政治条件，不谋求排他性权利，不强加于人，不开“空头支票”，充分尊重太平洋岛国意愿和实际需要。中方将继续深化同太平洋岛国合作，助力当地经济社会长远发展。中方支持巴新在国际和地区事务中发挥更大作用，愿同巴新就重大国际和地区问题加强沟通和协调，维护发展中国家共同利益。

;

;马拉佩表示，巴新和中国两国人民的友好交往源远流长，华人是两国的强有力人文纽带，在巴新国家建设中发挥着重要作用。习近平主席2018年对巴新的访问有力促进了两国关系发展，开启了两国关系新篇章。中国向巴新提供无私援助，给巴新人民带来了巨大福祉。巴新人民十分敬佩习近平主席的杰出世界领导力，感谢中国对巴新始终平等相待，充分尊重巴新的主权和独立。巴新坚定恪守一个中国原则，中国的主权和领土完整必须得到尊重。同中国加强合作，不仅对巴新意义重大，对世界也十分重要。巴新将同中国继续坚定相互支持，深化两国全面战略伙伴关系，加强“一带一路”框架内各领域合作，促进南太地区国家同中国互利合作，共同开创太平洋岛国和中国关系更加美好的未来。

;

;双方发表《中华人民共和国和巴布亚新几内亚独立国联合声明》。

;

;蔡奇、王毅参加会见。

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800 03版要闻 - 携手奔向下一个金色十年http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/18/nw.D110000renmrb_20231018_1-03.htm
;2023年10月18日星期三
; ;

;17日晚，国家主席习近平举行宴会，欢迎来华出席第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛的国际贵宾，并发表致辞。

;

;多国人士表示，习近平主席的致辞为推动高质量共建“一带一路”注入新动力，为各国实现共同繁荣发展注入正能量。他们表示，期待共建“一带一路”开启下一个金色十年新篇章，为人类建设更加美好的未来贡献磅礴力量。

;

; ; 向所有参与者、建设者致敬！;

;

;2013年9月和10月，习近平主席先后提出共建“丝绸之路经济带”和“21世纪海上丝绸之路”。10年来，中国已同150多个国家和30多个国际组织签署了230多份共建“一带一路”合作文件。

;

;“这些成就不是天上掉下来的，也不是什么人恩赐施舍的，而是各国政府、企业和人民用勤劳、智慧、勇气干出来的！”习近平在欢迎宴会上向共建“一带一路”所有的参与者、建设者致敬。

;

;“习近平主席的讲话是对10年来共建'一带一路'国家携手建设家园、将发展蓝图变成美好现实的最好鼓励！”巴基斯坦COMSATS伊斯兰堡大学中国研究中心主任塔希尔·蒙塔兹·阿万说，“习近平主席提出的共建'一带一路'倡议高瞻远瞩，把广大发展中国家带上了互利共赢、共同发展的大道。”

;

;10年来，共建“一带一路”开展了数千个务实合作项目，收获了实打实、沉甸甸的成果。

;

;“正如习近平主席所言，发展成就不是凭空出现的，而是通过各国参与者和建设者不懈努力得来的。”南非议会非国大党团研究员姆博洛说，“10年来，共建'一带一路'已成为联通全球发展合作的重要平台，各国坚持共商共建共享原则，分享发展资源，共享发展成果，在互利共赢中实现共同发展。”

;

;在俄罗斯国家杜马第一副主席、俄中友协主席梅利尼科夫看来，10年来，共建“一带一路”秉持以和平合作、开放包容、互学互鉴、互利共赢为核心的丝路精神，追求各国长期共同繁荣，持续吸引着越来越多国家参与其中。“相信在'一带一路'框架下持续推进和扩大合作，将不仅有助于世界经济增长，而且有利于各国深化友好交往、增进互信、推动更加可持续的全球发展。”

;

;17日当天，在万里之外的印度尼西亚首都雅加达，G1137次动车组缓缓驶出哈利姆车站。当天，习近平主席在人民大会堂同来华出席第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛并进行国事访问的印尼总统佐科举行会谈后，共同为雅万高铁正式开通运营揭幕。中印尼共建“一带一路”取得重大标志性成果。

;

;多次访问中国的印尼海洋与投资统筹部长卢胡特表示，中国拥有先进的高铁技术、丰富的运营经验、专业水平高超的建设者，印尼同中国共建“一带一路”合作取得累累硕果，两国在互惠互利中实现共赢。

;

;;三个“不可阻挡”彰显智慧担当;

;

;习近平主席在致辞中强调，和平、发展、合作、共赢的历史潮流不可阻挡，人民对美好生活的向往不可阻挡，各国实现共同发展繁荣的愿望不可阻挡。

;

;“习近平主席提出的三个'不可阻挡'彰显了极大的智慧和担当！”来华参加高峰论坛的巴基斯坦中国和全球化中心研究员艾哈迈德·佐恩表示，各国人民都渴望过上美好生活，各国政府都应努力让民众生活得更好，“这是我们的共同使命……'一带一路'10年来取得的成就向世界证明，通过坚持不懈的努力和团结协作就一定能够达成目标”。

;

;俄罗斯莫斯科国际关系学院欧亚研究中心主任、首席研究员伊万·萨夫兰丘克认为，“共建'一带一路'倡议强调和平合作、互利共赢，成为维护各国共同繁荣发展的重要力量。”

;

;“在拉美和加勒比地区，包括阿根廷在内多个国家加入共建'一带一路'，正是因为这些国家看到通过共建'一带一路'能够实现更加和谐、全面、可持续的发展。”阿根廷拉普拉塔国立大学中国研究中心研究员塞巴斯蒂安·舒尔茨说，当今世界存在激烈地缘政治竞争和局部冲突风险，共建“一带一路”秉持的丝路精神得到国际社会广泛认可。

;

;横跨亚得里亚海小斯通湾、连通克罗地亚南北国土的佩列沙茨大桥，是中克共建“一带一路”标志性项目，将原本3小时的车程缩短至数分钟，被克媒体誉为“民众期盼了300年的宏伟建筑”。

;

;“大桥通车实现了克罗地亚几代人的梦想，”克罗地亚政治分析家姆拉登·普莱舍表示，克罗地亚民众真切感受到共建“一带一路”的必要性并真正受益其中，“'一带一路'是真正能够实现互利共赢的倡议”。

;

;共建“一带一路”为完善全球治理体系拓展了新实践，也为变乱交织的世界带来更多确定性和稳定性。印度“新南亚论坛”创始人苏丁德拉·库尔卡尼认为，共建“一带一路”在带动经济增长的同时，促进人类社会更加团结。“不同文化、不同文明走到一起展开合作，有助于彼此建立信任、减少分歧，这样才能实现真正持久的和平。”

;

; ; 期待下一个金色十年;

;

;“共建'一带一路'走过了第一个蓬勃十年，正值风华正茂，务当昂扬奋进，奔向下一个金色十年！”习近平主席在致辞中呼吁。

;

;10年来，共建“一带一路”惠及广大合作伙伴及亿万普通民众。展望未来，多国人士认为，第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛将为“一带一路”倡议在下一个十年的发展注入新动力，为新时期加强共建“一带一路”国际合作、促进各国共同发展提供重要机遇。

;

;“各方齐聚本届论坛意义非凡，祝贺第三届'一带一路'国际合作高峰论坛！”日本前首相鸠山由纪夫说，“这是一场具有里程碑意义的活动，将给未来带来希望。”

;

;埃及《金字塔报》总编辑阿拉·萨比特对习近平主席“务当昂扬奋进，奔向下一个金色十年”的话语深感振奋。“本届论坛将为共建国家之间的合作、促进各国共同发展提供重要机遇，为今后确定发展方向。”萨比特说，“随着第二个十年到来，我相信共建'一带一路'将为推动世界和平发展发挥更加积极的作用。”

;

;俄罗斯高等经济大学世界经济和政治系主任阿娜斯塔西娅·利哈乔娃有着相同的感受。在她看来，本届论坛将为共建“一带一路”下一个十年发展开启新篇章，与会各方有望在基础设施、能源、金融等领域达成更多合作共识，推动更多重要项目落地，为各国共同发展繁荣贡献力量。

;

;习近平主席在致辞中指出，共建“一带一路”追求的是发展，崇尚的是共赢，传递的是希望。纵观人类发展史，唯有自强不息、不懈奋斗，才能收获累累果实，才能建立利在千秋、福泽万民的长久之功。这是我们这一代政治家对当代人和后代人的责任。

;

;克罗地亚政治分析家姆拉登·普莱舍对此深表认同。“各国政治家齐聚中国，出席本届高峰论坛，这印证了共建'一带一路'的重要性和必要性。”他说，“共建'一带一路'是当今世界最重要的倡议之一，为弥合分歧铺平道路，让每个国家都有机会共享发展机遇。”

;

;从捷斯—图巴高速公路到摔跤竞技场、从乡村打井工程到方久尼大桥，塞内加尔外国记者协会秘书长阿卜杜拉耶·巴对本国的“一带一路”合作项目如数家珍。“共建'一带一路'使世界许多地区实现互联互通，并持续推动全球实现团结和共同富裕。期待本届论坛能为非洲国家提供更多融资、贸易和多边合作的机会，为非洲加强基础设施建设提供新的重要机遇，”阿卜杜拉耶·巴说，“这对非洲将是一笔无价的财富！”

;

;（新华社北京10月17日电  综合新华社记者报道，执笔记者：商婧、何毅、班威）

;; Wed, 18 Oct 2023 07:26:05 +0800
